Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
MRBC SPOTLIGHT: CARVER V!


[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOutreach],OUTREACH]]: After both pro-[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKatherineSteiner],Katrina]] and pro-[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreVictorSD],Victor]] forces called in reinforcements, fighting is at an all time high on [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCarverV],Carver V]]. Refugees gather in makeshift camps as tanks and BattleMechs roam the countryside, attacking and counterattacking in an attempt to wrest control of the planet.

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
REBELLION ON CARVER V â€“ THE PEOPLE'S REVOLT!


[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOutreach],Outreach]]: New reports, however, confirm that a revolt is underway on the planet. Civilians, some say in the thousands, have banded together to stop the destruction of their planet.  Rallying under an ex-civil engineer, and styling themselves the Partisans, they seek to create a world free of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGreatHouses],Great House]] control. More importantly, sources from the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreVictorSD],Victor]] camp have indicated they would support an independent world they now call Liberty.  Meanwhile, all sides are calling for reinforcements and offering contracts through the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMRBC],MRBC]].
